# fadeInDuration

**Instance Property**

The time it takes in seconds for the effect to fade in.

## Declaration

```swift
var fadeInDuration: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

Maximum value allowed is 10 seconds.
title: fadeInDuration
